data.title: Tickets, Dates, Hours, & More Geek’d Details
data.meta_description: 2024 Geek'd Con Tickets Available Here What is Geek'd Con? Geek'd Con. For local geeks. By local geeks. Thanks to the support of the Shreveport-Bossier
data.text:
2024 Geek'd Con Tickets Available Here

What is Geek'd Con?

Geek'd Con. For local geeks. By local geeks.

Thanks to the support of the Shreveport-Bossier community, Geek'd Con has become the biggest Pop Culture event in the Ark-La-Tex, and one of the largest in the entire state of Louisiana.

The geek community in the Ark-La-Tex is pound-for-pound the biggest, and most passionate, groups of geeks you can find anywhere. They’ve displayed their commitment during multiple events across the area, from conventions to weekly game tournaments.

We're proud to help provide a fun, safe, family-friendly atmosphere for all aspects of our geek community to get together.

Vendors of all shapes and sizes; comic book stores, cell phone retailers, video game outlets, book stores, hobby shops, artists, writers, and more. The event will also feature National Headliners including comic book artists, stars of TV and film, and professional cos-play groups.

Geek’d Con will also host a full-scale cosplay competition. The potential for live-interactive sponsored events and panels exists as well.

Geek'd Con Ticket Info

Tickets are on-sale now! You will notice a new look and feel to the ticket site. We've worked hard to make it easier to use, and to reduce the ticketing fees substantially.

SWAG Passes are limited once again this year, and they usually sell out. So if you want them, don't wait too long.

There will be a Purchase Protection Program available when tickets are purchased. Make sure to read the details when you are buying your tickets.

Prices will increase at the Box Office.

Here's the prices for online tickets:

Weekend: $55

Swag Pass: $80 and limited (usually sells out)

Friday: $20

Saturday: $45

Sunday: $30

Geek'd Con Days & Hours

This year, Geek'd Con will take place at the Shreveport Convention Center August 16th, 17th, and 18th.

Convention Hours

Friday – 5pm-9pm

Saturday – 9am-7pm

Sunday – 10am-5pm

Geek'd Con FAQ

-Do you allow Cosplay?

YES! We highly encourage it!

For costume contest info and Cosplay rules please contact geekdcon@gmail.com

-Are there ID requirements or an age limit to enter the event?

No there is no ID requirements. No age limit. All ages welcome.

-What if I bought a weekend pass and lose my wristband?

Oh no! Try not to lose your weekend wristband, if you do please keep your receipt and we will be more than happy to replace your wristband at no additional cost. If you cannot prove your weekend purchase you will have to buy a new weekend pass.

-What are my transport/parking options getting to the event?

Parking is FREE all weekend long inside the Parking Garage, but arrive early, because parking will fill up. Check your hotel for shuttle availability.

-Are refunds available.

Not through Geek'd Con. If you have a specific question on refunds, you can email Brooke.Long@townsquaremedia.com

-What can/can't I bring to the event?

No outside food or beverage allowed inside. Personal cameras are allowed, so are backpacks. No projectile/sharp/dangerous cosplay accessories allowed. You can find the Convention Center's cosplay rules on our website.

-Where can I contact the organizer with any questions?

geekdcon@gmail.com

-Is my ticket transferrable?

Online tickets are non-transferrable. Physical tickets are allowed to be transferred, gifted, or resold.

Geek'd Con 2024 Guest Lineup

Geek'd Con is back for another fantastic year at the Shreveport Convention Center. On top of the regular Geek'd Con festivities, this year on the second floor we will debuting the Shreveport Sports Card Show - which will feature sports card vendors, memorabilia vendors and sports guests!

You can find the full line-up below. Tickets are on-sale now here.
